description: The rebels seized the car carrier in the Red Sea, claiming it was Israeli - but Israel says it is UK-owned.
maintext: Galaxy Leader is owned by Galaxy Maritime Ltd, which is registered in the Isle of Man. It is owned by Ray Car Carriers, which is co-owned by Israeli businessman Abraham Ungar, according to documents from the Isle of Man Government's Companies registry.
title: Japan condemns Yemen's Houthi rebels hijack of cargo ship in Red Sea
